You have not created any libraries yet. A Directory is a container to organize your files and folders. A Directory can also be shared with others and synced to your connected devices. You can create a Directory by clicking the "New Directory" button in the menu bar.

No libraries have been shared directly with you. A shared directory can be shared with full or restricted permission. If you need access to a library owned by another user, ask the user to share the directory with you.
You are not in any groups. Groups allow multiple people to collaborate on libraries.
